mapper.select: select subject_id ,subject_name ,subject_sub_id ,subject_sub_name ,doc.stu_id ,doc.stu_name ,pay_style ,lesson_fee ,lesson_fee_adjusted ,adjusted_date ,case when (lesson_fee_adjusted > 0.0) then lesson_fee_adjusted * 4 else lesson_fee * 4 end as month_fee ,minutes_per_lsn ,stu.introducer from v_latest_subject_info_from_student_document doc inner join t_mst_student stu on doc.stu_id = stu.stu_id where doc.subject_id = #{subjectId} and exists( select 1 from t_mst_student mst where mst.stu_id = doc.stu_id and mst.del_flg = 0 ) order by CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(subject_sub_id, '-', -1) as SIGNED), cast(SUBSTRING_INDEX(subject_sub_id, '-', -1)as signed),stu_name

select subject_id ,subject_name ,subject_sub_id ,subject_sub_name ,doc.stu_id ,doc.stu_name ,pay_style ,lesson_fee ,lesson_fee_adjusted ,adjusted_date ,case when (lesson_fee_adjusted > 0.0) then lesson_fee_adjusted * 4 else lesson_fee * 4 end as month_fee ,minutes_per_lsn ,stu.introducer from v_latest_subject_info_from_student_document doc inner join t_mst_student stu on doc.stu_id = stu.stu_id where doc.subject_id = #{subjectId} and doc.subject_sub_id = #{subjectSubId} and exists( select 1 from t_mst_student mst where mst.stu_id = doc.stu_id and mst.del_flg = 0 ) order by CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(subject_sub_id, '-', -1) as SIGNED), cast(SUBSTRING_INDEX(subject_sub_id, '-', -1)as signed),stu_name
